English(en):
ADVANCED SCENARIO:
COMMONWEALTH

Filipino(fil):
Magmaneho tayo sa Commonwealth, ikalawa sa pinaka-accident-prone na kalsada sa Metro Manila noong 2021.

Lumiko sa unang kanan patungong Tandang Sora Avenue.
English(en):
Let's drive through Commonwealth, the second most accident-prone road in Metro Manila in 2021.

Take the first right turn to Tandang Sora Avenue.
Turn right to Tandang Sora.
DO A U-TURN BACK TO COMMONWEALTH

Filipino(fil): Mag-U-turn bago sa red mark at kumanan pabalik Commonwealth.
English(en): Make a U-turn before the red mark and turn right back to Commonwealth.
Make a U-turn and turn right back to Commonwealth.

REMINDER:
DO NOT COUNTERFLOW

Filipino(fil): Huwag mag-counterflow. Manatili sa tamang linya.
English(en): Do not counterflow. Stay in the correct lane.

REMINDER:
TURN RIGHT ON TANDANG SORA

Filipino(fil): Nalampasan mo ang kanang likuan papuntang Tandang Sora Avenue.
English(en): You missed the right turn to Tandang Sora Avenue.

REMINDER:
USE THE HAND SIGNAL

Filipino(fil): I-signal ang kagustuhang lumiko 25 metro pa lang ang layo sa lilikuan.
English(en): Signal your intent to turn 25 meters away from the turn.
GO THROUGH THE FOOTBRIDGE

Filipino(fil): Dumaan sa footbridge papunta sa kabilang linya ng Commonwealth.
English(en): Go through the footbridge to the other side of Commonwealth.
CONTINUE ON THE BIKE LANE

Filipino(fil): Magpatuloy sa bike lane hanggang sa finish line.
English(en): Continue on the bike lane until the finish line.
Continue until the finish line.

REMINDER:
DO A U-TURN
You forgot to do a U-turn.

REMINDER:
STAY IN THE BIKE LANE

Filipino(fil): Manatili sa bike lang habang pabalik sa Commonwealth.
English(en): Stay in the bike lane when going back to Commonwealth.
